title.text: Microsoft .NET Framework 1.1 Service Pack 1 Security Update for Windows Server 2003 and Windows Server 2003 R2 for x64-based and Itanium-based Systems (KB953297)

description.text: A security issue has been identified that could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to compromise your system and gain control over it. You can help protect your system by installing this update from Microsoft. After you install this update, you may have to restart your system.
